sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import SideBar from '../components/BlogFolder/BlogPage/Sidebar' const SettingsContainer = styled.div` display: flex; ` const SettingsWrapper = styled.div` flex: 9; ` const SettingsTitle = styled.div` ` const SettingsUpdateTitle = styled.span` ` const SettingsDeleteTitle = styled.span` ` const SettingsForm = styled.form` ` const SettingsPp = styled.div`` const ProfilePicture = styled.img` ` export default function Settings() { return ( Update Your Account Delete Account ) }
